點樣我要諗呢啲問題，唔諗就唔會因為覺得人生並無意義而冇動力去生存，但一旦開始思考呢個問題，就已經無辦法無視呢個問題。

之後就諗，既然我賦予唔到人生意義作為自己生存嘅動力，咁不如就為左純綷享樂而生存，但又發現自己並冇真正享受嘅事物。食物、音樂、運動、閱讀、睇片、社交、畫畫丶做義工，做任何事都談不上樂趣，只是消磨時間嘅行為，甚至越做越空虛。我唯一可以免強享受到嘅就係瞓覺，準確啲講係可以短暫回到無意識狀態嘅時刻。

面對呢啲狀況，而又假設死後只是回歸虛無，我認為最聰明嘅辦法係自殺。但問題又黎，我必須承認自己係懦夫，唔敢去自殺，其一係因為過程嘅痛苦，其二係因為根本無法肯定死後只是回歸虛無。如果只是回歸虛無，對我呢啲認為人生只有麻煩痛苦沒有所謂意義同快樂嘅人黎講，死亡係件好事，亦無需恐懼，反正出生之前就乜就冇。但屌佢老母嘅係，唔同宗教有唔同對於人死左之後會點嘅講法，有啲話自殺死會落地獄，又有啲話會不斷重複自殺嘅過程，總之所有講法都係自殺之後會更痛苦，更加屌佢老母嘅係，所有呢啲講法都嘅不可證實亦不可證偽，換言之所有嘅講法都有可能，那怕可能性再低。就係咁死亡有可能係比無意義嘅生存更差，咁就連自殺呢條出路都冇埋，得番絕望。

生又唔係死又唔係，係被生存嘅情況下，要搵番生存嘅主動權，即係生存嘅動力，似乎不得不賦予本來無意義嘅生命意義。但無中生有，談何容易？咁容易，一開始我就唔會得出人生並無意義嘅答案。咁是但搵啦，令世界變更好？但咁做嘅意義又係？當然比我又答到，但我仍然可以追問呢個答案嘅意義，永無止境咁問落去。因此我又諗，會唔會呢個世界無意義到問義意本身就無意義？

屌，點解我可以毫無邏輯地諗咁多野，庸人自擾。點解我唔可以盲目咁隨波俗流，好似同輩咁唔諗呢啲嘢吃喝玩樂，追求下社經地位，求下安居樂業，？當我嘗試咁做，又會好自然咁諗我追求呢啲野為乜，最終又回到意義問題。諗到就黎癲，或者因為我癲左先至會諗咁多問題。

I guess the meaning of life needs some sort of self-confirmation. If you are treating everything external, you hardly find any meaning in it. You gotta internalize something, to trust something that it will never betray you, and then you work for the good of that thing. This will give you good meaning.

Hedonism is a bad idea, as you said, happiness is not trustworthy. It's affected by metabolisms; emotion swings are easily generated. Sometimes one small thing could upset you much harder than the other time. Having ups and downs are the norm of life, and that shouldn't demolish your meaning. Using your own happiness as meaning is a really bad idea.

People are different. Getting consistent resonance with someone is hard. In all we never know *what* is *other people*. It's not something we can have sufficient control of. Treating someone as your meaning is a bad bet. At least it should not be your primary meaning.

I have been seeking for the answer for long. My answer changes every now and then. I love my dog, but she will die someday, and actually that day will not be far. So a year ago, I went for another answer. I am doing a PhD, I am internalizing knowledge as a part of me. Improving the body of knowledge gives me meaning, and metaphysically that did not fail me thus far.

Meaning is only one part of life. There are many other parts that you may work on as to make your life better. Eat healthy, work out, maintain a healthy social network. Sometimes tidying up your own room could make you feel better. Sometimes take a shower. Cook yourself a good meal. If the environment around you doesn't allow, change to another one. I do not mean that you should be satisfied by these, but it is a good and essential start. The meaning is always an important thing, but it is less urgent. Finding meaning is a life-long process.

Using your own happiness as meaning is a really bad idea.

People are different. Getting consistent resonance with someone is hard. In all we never know *what* is *other people*. It's not something we can have sufficient control of. Treating someone as your meaning is a bad bet. At least it should not be your primary meaning.

I have been seeking for the answer for long. My answer changes every now and then. I love my dog, but she will die someday, and actually that day will not be far. So a year ago, I went for another answer. I am doing a PhD, I am internalizing knowledge as a part of me. Improving the body of knowledge gives me meaning, and metaphysically that did not fail me thus far.

Meaning is only one part of life. There are many other parts that you may work on as to make your life better. Eat healthy, work out, maintain a healthy social network. Sometimes tidying up your own room could make you feel better. Sometimes take a shower. Cook yourself a good meal. If the environment around you doesn't allow, change to another one. I do not mean that you should be satisfied by these, but it is a good and essential start. The meaning is always an important thing, but it is less urgent. Finding meaning is a life-long process.
